data.title: California drought action
data.excerpt: State actions against drought September 23, 2021 Governor Gavin Newsom signed a package of climate action bills that include $5.2 billion for drought response and long-term water resilience. The measures will secure and expand water supplies, support water infrastructure, improve water security and quality, and support wildlife. July 28, 2021 Governor Newsom signs AB 148, … Read more
data.author: Peggy Gartin

_genesis_description: Learn more about current drought conditions, the state’s drought response, and how everyone can save water.
_open_graph_description: Learn more about current drought conditions, the state’s drought response, and how everyone can save water.
